page.title: 18Teenage life in Pavenhill
page.content: A 17 year old from Pavenhill gave this information:- He had lived in Purton from the age of one. He was educated in Purton and was now studying at the NEW College in Swindon. He hoped to go to university to study software engineering. He was prepared to move to a different part of the country to gain employment. His social activities were ice-skating at the newly opened Link Centre in West Swindon, going to a computer club and helping out on a farm. He enjoyed listening to a range of music from some classics to electronic music. For transport he used a bus or was driven by parents or friends. He preferred village life to living in a town.
